title: Leaver Buster Cause I Lag Out & Have an old laptop and cant afford a new one
body: My Laptop sucks and freezes on loading screen, I didnt notice for too long and the game was remade, but now I have to wait 20 mins for each game, this happens sometimes, not every game.  I'm sort of mad but I can understand the frustration of the other players.  :(

replies.body: That really sucks that your current laptop is starting to have these problems :(. Maybe we can help this out a bit by turning on the option "close client during game" under the client options. That should reduce some of the load your pc is trying to handle all at once, but definitely let me know if that doesn't help and we can try a couple other things.
